metadata.name: From Pretoria, With Love.
metadata.description:
(an Ode to the Capital City)

Using his pastel palettes, benabstract wanted to create a colorful piece inspired by the city he was born & raised in. from the Jacaranda trees & the iconic buildings, he also adds elements of his childhood memories as he invites you to see the world through his eyes. still playing against expectations of how form and color translate the intricacies of love and life.

created in illustrator & photoshop.
